mapper.select: SELECT mS.id AS subitemId, mS.subitem_name AS subitemName, mC.id AS categoryId, mC.cname AS categoryName, mS.semester AS semester, mR.id AS recordId, mR.description1 AS description1, CASE WHEN mR.id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS done FROM _sw_mileage_subitem AS mS INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_category AS mC ON mS.category_id = mC.id INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_record AS mR ON mR.subitem_id = mS.id WHERE mR.snum = #{studentId} ORDER BY mC.cname, mS.regdate
